caption.p: Comparison of eye exposure to direct droplet spray to that of the mouth and nares: (a), average total eye surface exposed; shaded area represents proportion of time not exposed, due to winking; (b), average total mouth area exposed in talking; shaded area represents proportion of time not exposed, due to closure; (c), average total area of cross-section of nares exposed; shaded area represents proportion of time not exposed, owing to protected position and expiration [ 5].
